name: Arla Foods amba
membership: Milchindustrieverband; Dairy UK; LandbrugFødevarer; DIFødevarer; NZO; Finnish Dairy Association; LRF Mjölk;BCZ-CBL
goal: Arla Foods er et Kooperative eget af godt 12.000 landmænd fra syv EU medlemslande (Tyskland, UK, Danmark, Sverige og BENELUX). Arla producerer mejeriprodukter og sælger dem globalt i mere end 100 lande under brands som LURPAK, CASTELLO, ARLA og PUCK.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
